posts.name: Max Radermacher
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.70 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Signal needs a signal, but the improved retry logic in this update should come in handy the next time you find yourself in an area with poor WiFi or cellular reception.

We’ve also made some (hopefully invisible) improvements to how notifications for incoming messages are processed and presented. Let us know if you experience any delays or other issues related to notifications or delivery receipts.

There are also some changes when sharing to Signal from third-party apps, so let us know about any issues you experience here as well!

Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.69 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.70.0.905-beta

75 new commits since 7.69.0.888-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.70 [1]

  • Remove leading / from AppAttest request URLs [2]

  • Use PUT, not POST, for registering a key in AppAttest [3]

  • Support cancellation in DebouncedTask [4]

  • Add application/octet-stream header to AppAttest requests with .data bodies [5]

  • Don't run backup export job if Upload on Cellular disabled and no wifi [6]

  • Use an actor for synchronization in BackupAttachmentTrackerTest [7]

  • "Backup Size" on BackupSettings doesn't update [8]

  • Base64Url-encode keyId param in AppAttest requests [9]

  • Add network-error Retry for BackupExportJob [10]

  • Make BackupDetailView take observed properties at init [11]

  • Don't locally enforce a max backup upload size limit [12]

  • Allow cancelling from manual restore 'restore method' screen. [13]

  • Remove TestScheduler & Schedulers [14]

  • Add additional logging to AppAttest key-registration request [15]

  • Catch and rethrow CancellationError in BackupExportJob [16]

  • Update logging in BackupAttachment upload/download [17]

  • Wipe transient Backup settings when disabling [18]

  • Adopt /v2/config [19]

  • Vary the backup restore confirmation based on manual/quick restore [20]

  • Connect 'Learn More' to support page [21]

  • Propertly restore into manual restore mode on post-reg relaunch [22]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.55.0 [23]

  • Use the web socket when deleting your account [24]

  • Open a web socket when replying to notifications [25]

  • Add BackupOversizeTextCache table [26]

  • Make backup restore in registration resumable after app termination [27]

  • Assume AppAttest generated key string are base64-encoded data [28]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.76.5 [29]

  • Don’t connect concurrently in multiple processes [30]

  • Don't prompt to enable backups if its been enabled before [31]

  • Rotate uploadEra when enabling paidAsTester [32]

  • [Payments] Add mobilecoin enclave measurements for v7.x [33]

  • Add UX in BackupSettings for "Back Up Now" [34]

  • Show error sheets when manual Backup export fails [35]

  • Rename AsyncAtomic -> SeriallyAccessedState [36]

  • Asyncify recoverPendingPniChangeNumberState [37]

  • Asyncify enableReglock [38]

  • Asyncify updateAccountAttributes [39]

  • Asyncify registration’s makeRequest method [40]

  • Asyncify didTapExport [41]

  • Remove promiseForTSRequest method [42]

  • Use the web socket in the share extension [43]

  • Partially revert "Show error sheets when manual Backup export fails" […] [44]

  • Use a TaskQueue instead of DebouncedTask in BackupDisablingManager [45]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.76.6 [46]

  • Asyncify RegistrationCoordinator backupTo/restoreFrom SVR [47]

  • Add new SVR2 MRENCLAVE values [48]

  • Remove fully-rolled-out validation configs [49]

  • Update auth for batch identity check requests [50]

  • Split apart “is network failure” and “is timeout” [51]

  • Rename “Flags” → “Remote Config” [52]

  • Use asyncRequest where trivially possible [53]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.76.7 [54]

  • Retry message sends when opening a socket [55]

  • Add remote configs for extension web sockets [56]

  • Add ChatListFYISheetCoordinator, migrate badge sheets to it [57]

  • Consolidate Backup FeatureFlags, add RemoteConfig to show Settings [58]

  • Skip AppAttest check, for now, if opted into Backups via remote config [59]

  • Asyncify updateConversionRates [60]

  • Asyncify Auth.fetch(…) [61]

  • Remove unused variable [62]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.56.0 [63]

  • Add kill switch for the connection lock [64]

  • Reorder past SVR enclave values to be newest-first [65]

  • Fix shouldConnect/shouldDisconnect checks [66]

  • Ignore contact sync result when bg fetch times out [67]

  • Updated design for inactive primary devices [68]

  • Recreate BackupOversizeTextCache table with <= length check not < [69]

  • Make it easier to handle some attachment upload errors [70]

  • Remove workaround avoiding AppAttest call [71]

  • Validate multiple oversized texts at once in AttachmentContentValidator [72]

  • Conform CancellableContinuation to Sendable [73]

  • Update release notes [74]

  • Update translations [75]

I tried sharing a link from Firefox to a Signal group chat. In the message field in the share sheet, I typed in @ and then started typing a friend’s name, but I didn’t get any mention suggestions.

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Unfortunately, this is currently a known limitation of this specific flow (sharing media into a group via the share extension not supporting mentions). It’s something we are tracking internally.

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.71 release.
